overview.en: IGC general chain by Cambodia joint European famous artificial intelligence research company key-2 LUXURY GOAL with concentration research and development, through the establishment of a distributed P2P network liquidation, let the world server point-to-point financial transactions with each other, decentralized management, without middlemen, also do not need any complex conversion procedures, provide strong liquidity for cross-border payments.
overview.zh: IGC通用链由柬埔寨联合欧洲著名人工智能科研公司LUXURY GOAL潜心研发，通过建立一个分布式的P2P清算网络，让全世界服务器互相进行点对点金融交易，去中心化管理，无须中间人，也无须任何繁杂的兑换手续，为跨界支付提供极强流动性。
